page.title: 07TRANSPORT-TAUNTON TRAFFIC
page.content: The traffic system at the eastern approach to Taunton has seen lots of changes in the last year. Between Wordsworth Drive and The Parade there have appeared 9 new combinations of traffic lights operated by their own mini-computers. The traffic flow has increased by 30% over the last 10 years even with the building of the motorway and the accident rate was high among cyclists and pedestrians. Despite adverse public comment and press reports surveys show that the flow has improved by 30% and when the lights are centrally controlled by computer this wil be better by another 15% The planners say that in the next 50 years there will be a further increase of 50% meaning new road systems,possibly traffic free centres and out of town shopping in large hypermarkets.
